revised_title: Investigation of High-Energy Particle Scattering Using Photographic Method
tldr: The authors developed a photographic method to detect and study the scattering of high-energy particles from a cyclotron. This method allowed them to record scattered particles at various angles simultaneously, reducing the time needed for experiments and providing a more detailed analysis of the scattering processes. The authors tested this method on protons and deuterons, demonstrating its effectiveness in studying high-energy particle scattering.
